p: The live attenuated RVF Smithburn vaccine also referred as Smithburn neurotropic strain or SNS. The Smithburn neurotropic strain of RVF virus was derived from the virulent Entebbe strain by numerous serial intracerebral passages in mice [ 45]. This live vaccine was imported from South Africa and subsequently produced by VSVRI according to protocol of WHO/FAO (1983) [ 46].
